initialTwistCards.text: Phone only connects to the same stranger
Reflections move slightly out of sync
Clock runs backwards for one hour daily
Strange symbols appear in morning coffee
GPS always leads to same location
Everyone mispronounces your name the same way
Same song plays on every radio station
Birthday candles impossible to blow out
Random people call you by previous tenant's name
Birds gather outside window every morning
Handwritten notes appear in personal journal
Neighbors all leave home at exactly same time
Strangers ask about event that never happened
Books contain different text when reread
Rain falls only on specific property
Doorbell rings with no one there
Elevator always stops at unselected floor
Appliances function better when cursed at
Tree grows overnight in suburban yard
Strangers wave as if they know you
Bus makes unscheduled stops for non-existent passengers
Mail arrives addressed to future tenant
Someone follows but disappears when confronted
Faucet runs different colored water daily
Car radio picks up personal conversations
Trash returned to doorstep neatly organized
Animals freeze when not directly observed
Perfect circle of dead grass appears in lawn
Telephone rings exactly three times daily
Specific word missing from all books
Store receipt items don't match purchases
Lights flicker when specific name mentioned
Watch runs perfectly except at specific times
Taxi drivers take identical route regardless of destination
Children sing unknown melody in unison
Shoes rearrange in pairs not worn together
Street signs rearrange on familiar route
Door opens to different room at night
Same customer makes identical order daily
Weather forecast always wrong by exact amount
Strangers insert identical phrase in conversation
Room temperature varies in perfect pattern
Footprints appear in fresh snow indoors
Books always open to same page
Mobile phone only photographs in black and white
Specific word causes mild electric shock when spoken
Morning cup contains written message at bottom
Dog barks at specific corner of empty room
Smoke detector activates at precise time
